display_long_description:
Flick Tags is an immersive virtual reality multiplayer game that places players in the roles of agile gorilla characters, engaging in an energetic and competitive game of tag. Designed to deliver a high-paced and interactive experience, Flick Tags emphasizes skillful movement, strategic thinking, and real-time player interaction.

At the heart of the game is its unique locomotion system, where players use their virtual arms to propel themselves through the environment, climb walls, swing from obstacles, and launch themselves across the terrain with precision and speed. This physical movement style enhances immersion and adds a layer of challenge and excitement not found in traditional control schemes.

Set in a variety of visually captivating and carefully designed environments, players are encouraged to explore, adapt, and master their surroundings. Each match becomes a test of reflexes, agility, and creativity as players attempt to evade their pursuers or close in on their targets.

Whether you're tagging others or escaping capture, Flick Tags offers a fresh and thrilling experience that highlights the potential of virtual reality multiplayer gameplay. With an emphasis on fast-paced action, community engagement, and continuous movement, Flick Tags provides a one-of-a-kind VR adventure that's both fun and physically engaging.
